dkeep.logic

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has information about the game, most importantly its level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Level startingLevel)
      Constructs a new game, setting its level to the parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeLevel(Level newLevel)
      Sets the game's level to the parameter.
      boolean checkEnemyTurn()
      On the enemies' turn, checks if an enemie killed the hero.
      boolean checkHeroTurn()
      On the hero's turn, checks if the hero stunned an enemie and checks if an enemie killed the hero.
      void checkKey()
      Checks if the hero picked up the key, if so opens the doors and changes the hero's display char.
      void draw()
      Prints the worktable of the game's level in the console.
      void EndOfTurnCheckin()
      Checks if the key was picked up and if so opens the doors and changes the hero's display char.
      Level getLevel()
      Returns the game's current level.
      char[][] getWorktable()
      Returns the worktable of the game's level.
      boolean isEndLevel()
      Returns true if the hero is positioned on a open door.

      Returns true if the game is over and false otherwise.
      boolean isLastLevel()
      Returns true if the game's current level is the last level of the game.

      Sets the gameOver flag to the parameter.
      void setLastLevel(boolean lastLevel)
      Sets the 'lastLevel' attribute to the parameter.
      void updateGame()
      Moves all enemies in the game's level and checks if they killed the hero, if so ending the game
      boolean updateHero(int direction)
      If possible updates the hero position according to the parameter.
      boolean updateHero2()
      Moves the hero down if possible.
      boolean updateHero4()
      Moves the hero to the left if possible.
      boolean updateHero6()
      Moves the hero to the right if possible.
      boolean updateHero8()
      Moves the hero up if possible.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Level startingLevel)
        Constructs a new game, setting its level to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        startingLevel - the level that the game's level will be set to

    • Method Detail

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Returns true if the game is over and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        the boolean value that indicates if the game is over

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Prints the worktable of the game's level in the console.
        See Also:
        Level

      • getWorktable

        public char[][] getWorktable()
        Returns the worktable of the game's level.
        Returns:
        the worktable of the game's level

      • updateHero2

        public boolean updateHero2()
        Moves the hero down if possible. The hero can not move down if that position is occupied by a wall, a closed door or a stunned ogre. Returns true if the movement was successful and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that indicates if the hero's position was updated

      • updateHero4

        public boolean updateHero4()
        Moves the hero to the left if possible. The hero can not move left if that position is occupied by a wall, a closed door or a stunned ogre. Returns true if the movement was successful and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that indicates if the hero's position was updated

      • updateHero6

        public boolean updateHero6()
        Moves the hero to the right if possible. The hero can not move right if that position is occupied by a wall, a closed door or a stunned ogre. Returns true if the movement was successful and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that indicates if the hero's position was updated

      • updateHero8

        public boolean updateHero8()
        Moves the hero up if possible. The hero can not move up if that position is occupied by a wall, a closed door or a stunned ogre. Returns true if the movement was successful and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        a boolean value that indicates if the hero's position was updated

      • EndOfTurnCheckin

        public void EndOfTurnCheckin()
        Checks if the key was picked up and if so opens the doors and changes the hero's display char. It also checks if the hero was killed by an enemie, if so setting the gameOver flag.

      • updateHero

        public boolean updateHero(int direction)
        If possible updates the hero position according to the parameter. If the movement was successful checks if the key was picked up or if the hero was killed, handling those events in case they occur. Returns true if the movement was successful and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        direction - integer value indicating where the character will attempt to move to
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the movement was successful

      • updateGame

        public void updateGame()
        Moves all enemies in the game's level and checks if they killed the hero, if so ending the game
        See Also:
        Level

      • setGameOver

        public void setGameOver(boolean state)
        Sets the gameOver flag to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        state - boolean value to set gameOver to

      • isEndLevel

        public boolean isEndLevel()
        Returns true if the hero is positioned on a open door. Return false otherwise.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the hero is positioned on a open door

      • checkHeroTurn

        public boolean checkHeroTurn()
        On the hero's turn, checks if the hero stunned an enemie and checks if an enemie killed the hero. Returns false if the hero lived after his turn or returns true if he died.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the hero lived after his turn

      • checkEnemyTurn

        public boolean checkEnemyTurn()
        On the enemies' turn, checks if an enemie killed the hero. Returns false if the hero lived after the enemies' turn or returns true if he died.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the hero lived after the enemies' turn

      • checkKey

        public void checkKey()
        Checks if the hero picked up the key, if so opens the doors and changes the hero's display char.

      • isLastLevel

        public boolean isLastLevel()
        Returns true if the game's current level is the last level of the game. Returns false otherwise.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the current level is the game's last level.

      • setLastLevel

        public void setLastLevel(boolean lastLevel)
        Sets the 'lastLevel' attribute to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        lastLevel - boolean value to set the 'lastLevel' attribute to

      • getLevel

        public Level getLevel()
        Returns the game's current level.
        Returns:
        the game's current level.

      • changeLevel

        public void changeLevel(Level newLevel)
        Sets the game's level to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        newLevel - level to set the game's level to
